itunes:title: Bonus: Groundhog Day with Josh Gondelman
title: Bonus: Groundhog Day with Josh Gondelman
description:
What if there is no tomorrow? There wasn’t one today. Josh Gondelman is here to laugh and cry with us, and to unpack the heaps of big feelings in Groundhog Day. 

Subscribe to You Are Good here.

Josh Gondelman can be found on Twitter and right here.

Support You're Wrong About:

Donate on Paypal
Buy cute merch

Support the show (http://patreon.com/yourewrongabout)
